sqlMap.select: SELECT ESNTL_ID , USER_ID , USER_NM , AUTHOR_CL , USE_AT , WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE , UPDT_ID , TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDT_DE , PASSWORD , CRTFC_AT , EMAIL FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #user_id# AND USE_AT = 'Y'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER_CONECT_HIST (CONECT_SN, ESNTL_ID, CONECT_IP, CONECT_DT) VALUES (SQ_CONECT_SN.NEXTVAL, #esntl_id#, #conect_ip#, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.select: SELECT Count(1) FROM TB_USER WHERE UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER(#user_id#)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER (ESNTL_ID, USER_ID, USER_NM, WRITNG_ID, PASSWORD, WRITNG_DT , AUTHOR_CL, USE_AT, MOBLPHON_NO, CRTFC_AT, EMAIL_RECPTN_AT, EMAIL, SEX, BIRTH, CERTKEY) VALUES (#esntl_id#, #user_id#, #user_nm#, #esntl_id#, #password#, SYSDATE , 'G', 'Y', #moblphon_no#, 'N', #email_recptn_at#, #email#, #sex#, #birth#, #certkey# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT Count(1) FROM TB_USER WHERE CERTKEY = #certkey# AND CRTFC_AT = 'N'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET CRTFC_AT = 'Y' WHERE CERTKEY = #certkey#
